text: Ceará Sporting Club is a Brazilian football team from Fortaleza, Ceará. == Achievements == === Football === *Campeonato Cearense: 43 (1) ::1915, 1916, 1917, 1918, 1919, 1922, 1925, 1931, 1932, 1939, 1941, 1942, 1948, 1951, 1957, 1958, 1961, 1962, 1963, 1971, 1972, 1975, 1976, 1977, 1978, 1980, 1981, 1984, 1986, 1989, 1990, 1992, 1993, 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2002, 2006, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 *Liga Metropolitana Cearense: 1915, 1916, 1917, 1918, 1919 *Copa Norte-Nordeste: 1 ::1969 *Copa do Nordeste: 1 ::2015 *Copa do Brasil: 0 ::Runners-up (1): 1994 ::Semi-Finals (2): 2005, 2011 *Copa Verão do Recife: 1 ::1997 Category:Brazilian football clubs Category:Ceará Category:1914 establishments in Brazil
title: Ceará Sporting Club
